pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel core i3 or AMD analog
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 740 or AMD analog
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel core i5 or AMD analog
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or AMD analog
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.recommended:
